entries.title: Guild Reborn
entries.content: After reconciling zone structures and styling, the Codex shimmered once again with golden parchment and glowing shadows.

entries.title: First Quest Saved
entries.content: The new Quest Editor form successfully pushed dynamic quests into the system and marked the dawn of modular storytelling.

entries.title: Aether Discovery
entries.content: Aether Archive was unlocked after a mysterious event.

entries.title: The First Flame
entries.content: The guild's origin began beneath fractured skies...

entries.title: Rise of the Cartographers
entries.content: They mapped the forgotten ruins with meticulous ink...
